attributes.action: Put the funding back into helping those in poverty and flood hit Britain
attributes.additional_details:
We in the UK need serious help too and rapidly!  We need emergency funding to reinstate roads and railway networks.   We need food and heating for our pensioners & our young families.

We shouldn't be giving away billions of pounds abroad in aid, when we have families in severe crisis over here, relying on food/clothing banks just to live - children also being taken by boat, through sewage infected waters, to go to school!

 We are like a third world country and the food supply/crop situation is just going to get worse!  We can't be giving money away, when we are in the same situation!

We need help & we need it now!  Right across the UK!
